description:
* Based on a fantasy romantic shoujo manga drawn by http://anidb.net/cr4188 [Takaya Natsuki]. It was serialized in http://anidb.net/cr988 [Hakusensha]`s Hana to Yume from 1998 to 2006 with 23 volumes.
After a family tragedy turns her life upside down, plucky high schooler http://anidb.net/ch108 [Honda Tooru] takes matters into her own hands and moves out...into a tent! Unfortunately for her, she pitches her new home on private land belonging to the mysterious Souma clan, and it isn`t long before the owners discover her secret. But, as Tooru quickly finds out when the family offers to take her in, the Soumas have a secret of their own--when touched by the opposite sex, they turn into the animals of the Chinese Zodiac!
Source: Yen Press
Note: The first two episodes received early screenings on March 26 & 27 in approx 50 american cinemas

REGULAR.description:
Temporarily homeless high school student Tohru Honda doesn`t want to cause her friends any trouble, so she`s been secretly living in a tent instead of asking to stay with any of them. Then she meets the owners of the land she pitched her tent on...
Source: crunchyroll

Tohru learns the Soma family`s shocking secret: they transform into zodiac animals! Is this show a zodiac animal transformation home comedy?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: みなさんが動物なんです!

REGULAR.description:
Kyo and Yuki both confide in Tohru about their insecurities, and she discovers that they have a lot in common for people who seem like such opposites.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jouons au président et au clochard
大貧民をやりましょう

REGULAR.description:
Kagura Soma visits and expresses her rather explosive love for Kyo. At first she regards Tohru as a potential rival, but she soon comes to realize that Tohru is interested in friendship, not fighting.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nani Doshi no Kata na no Desuka?
なにどしの方なのですか?

REGULAR.description:
Tohru has come to think of the Somas as her new family, but her faith in herself and in her relationships is shaken when her biological family says they`re ready to take her back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 勘違いをしていました

REGULAR.description:
On school festival day, the gang sells a ton of rice balls thanks to an innovative Prince Yuki marketing technique. Bonus: two other members of the Soma family come to the festival to introduce themselves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Perhaps We Should Invite Ourselves Over
Ça te gênerait qu`on vienne chez toi ?
お邪魔させてもらおうかしら

REGULAR.description:
A nervous Tohru visits the main Soma estate for her meeting with Hatori. There, she finds out the backstory behind Hatori`s seemingly harsh attitude toward her.
Source: crunchyroll

Tohru tries to figure out how to cause everyone the least amount of trouble over the New Year`s holiday. Meanwhile, Yuki and Kyo try to figure out how to survive three days without Tohru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: See You When You Get Back

REGULAR.description:
Kyo fights Yuki, Yuki fights a cold, and Tohru meets a new Soma whose mood swings may be even more extreme than Kagura`s.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yuki wa Watashi no Hatsukoi Dakara
由希は俺の初恋だから

REGULAR.description:
Shigure does some serious scheming while Kagura, Kyo, Yuki, and Tohru all go on a double date.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: C`est la saint Valentin, après tout
だって, バレンタインだもん

REGULAR.description:
It`s "White Day," the day that boys who received chocolates on Valentine`s Day give their return gifts to the girls. And Momiji has one big surprise gift for Tohru!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: とってもステキなお宿です

REGULAR.description:
It`s the first day of the new school year, and the students of Kaibara High School gets their first look at Momiji and Hatsuharu`s "unique" approach to school uniforms. Another member of the Soma family also pays a visit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tu as l`air de bien t`amuser
You Look Like You`re Having Fun

REGULAR.description:
Tohru meets a man she never knew existed, and learns something about Yuki that she never knew before.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment vas-tu ? Mon très cher frère !
Genki de Ita ka na? Waga Otouto yo
How Have You Been, My Brother?
元気でいたかな? 我が弟よっ

REGULAR.description:
Tohru learns more about Momiji Soma and visits her mother’s grave with her friends.
Source: crunchyroll

Tohru, Yuki, Kyo, Shigure, and Hatori go on a trip to the Soma vacation house near a lake.
Source: crunchyroll

Uotani plans a group gift for Tohru. Then, the Somas learn more about Uotani`s past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: She Said Don`t Step on Them!
踏むなっつってんだろが!

REGULAR.description:
Uotani continues to tell about her past and how meeting Kyoko and Tohru impacted her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: うおちゃんの分ですっ!

REGULAR.description:
Hatsuharu unexpectedly shows up with a new Soma who doesn’t speak a word.
Source: crunchyroll

Another Soma comes to visit, while Mitsuru begs Shigure for his manuscript.
Source: crunchyroll

Hiro Soma comes to introduce himself, and it rapidly becomes obvious that he is not a Tohru Honda fan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can`t Believe You Picked It Up
何マジで拾ってんのさ

REGULAR.description:
Members of Prince Yuki do some scheming and visit Hanajima’s house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Never Back Down from a Wave Fight
Je dois répondre aux provocations des ondes
売られた電波は買わなくちゃ

REGULAR.description:
We learn more about Hanajima’s past and how she meets Uotani and Tohru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Parce que ça m`a fait plaisir
だって嬉しかったのよ

REGULAR.description:
Tohru comes down with a cold, and the Somas help her while she recovers.
Source: crunchyroll

Kazuma Soma’s visit to the house is more than a casual visit, especially for Kyo. Will we finally find out Kyo’s secret?
Source: crunchyroll

Kazuma leaves without a word to Kyo while Yuki and Kagura fight their own battles. Then, Shigure gathers everybody for dinner at his house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: もうすぐ夏がやってきます

2778.name: slow when it comes to love

6232.name: character related tags which need deleting or merging

titles.title: フルーツバスケット 1st season
